                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো অন্তরীকরণযোগ্য ভেক্টর অপেক্ষকের ডাইভারজেন্স হচ্ছে-</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2207;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="width: 3.008em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2207;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="width: 2.735em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 8</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>P ও Q বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="width: 4.771em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

4.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>−</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm \overrightarrow {PQ}=\overrightarrow {Q}-\overrightarrow {P}=\left(3\hat{i}-2\hat{j}+4\hat{k}\right)-\left(-3\hat{i}+4\hat{j}+5\hat{k}\right) \\

=6\hat{i}-6\hat{j}-\hat{k} </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৯]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 9</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="width: 1.232em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0.</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0.</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="width: 20.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1016.6em, 3.568em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-387"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-389"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-391"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-412"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-414"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-415"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-416"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-421"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-423"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-428"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-429"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-430"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0.</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0.</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm \overrightarrow {P}.\overrightarrow{Q}=\left(4\hat{i}+2\hat{j}+0.\hat{k}\right).\left(0.\hat{i}+0.\hat{j}+5\hat{k}\right)=0&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫, ৯৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 10</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পড়ন্ত বস্তুর সূত্র দিয়েছেন কে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিউটন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্যালিলিও</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="width: 4.547em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow><mn>9.8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="width: 10.412em; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-460"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-size: 70.7%; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮৯]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 14</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>খাড়াভাবে ওপরে নিক্ষিপ্ত বস্তুর ক্ষেত্রে সর্বাধিক উচ্চতা,&nbsp;H = ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="width: 4.055em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.327em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.913em, 1003.33em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-472"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="padding-left: 0.276em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.235em, 1000.82em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.597em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-476"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.278em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.823em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 16</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বৃত্তাকার পথে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="width: 4.249em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.467em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.47em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-517"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-521"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-523"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-524"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>20</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm 20\ ms^{-1}</script></span> সমদ্রুতিতে চলমান কোনো গাড়ির কেন্দ্রমুখী ত্বরণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="width: 3.653em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.98em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-528"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-532"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>20</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="width: 9.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1007.79em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-539"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-543"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-548" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-549"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-550"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-551"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>20</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm r=\frac{v^2}{a}=\frac{{20}^2}{4}=100\ m&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২০৩]</p>

                                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="width: 12.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.41em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-653"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪১]</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যালুমিনিয়াম&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৯৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 32</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পানি বায়ুর সংস্পর্শে থাকলে পানির পৃষ্ঠটান কত?</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 33</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রেনল্ডের সংখ্যা, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="width: 1.38em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.12em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-857"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-858"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm R_e </script></span>&nbsp;এর মান কত হলে ধারারেখ প্রবাহ হবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 42</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>2 m তরঙ্গদৈর্ঘ্যের&nbsp;একটি তরঙ্গের বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>300</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-929" style="width: 4.845em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.951em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.95em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-930"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-933" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-934"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-936"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-937"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>300</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm 300\ ms^{-1} </script></span> হলে এর কম্পাঙ্ক কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>300</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>150</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="width: 14.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.76em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-941"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-947" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-948" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">150</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>λ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>300</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>150</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm v=n\lambda \Rightarrow n=\frac{v}{\lambda}=\frac{300}{2}=150\ Hz </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 44</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো শ্রেণিকক্ষে শব্দের তীব্রতা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="width: 8.348em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.82em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.82em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-962"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-966"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-967"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-969"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-970"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-971" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="width: 16.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1013.53em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-982"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৭৭]</p>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 49</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ক্লসিয়াস ও ম্যাক্সওয়েলের গড় মুক্তপথের সমীকরণের অনুপাত কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1066"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1072" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.76em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.97em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1080"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">273</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">160</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2457</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2297</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1005.58em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -1.35em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">574.25</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.674em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.397em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.603em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2457</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2297</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>574.25</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\rm \frac{F-32}{9}=\frac{K-273}{5}\Rightarrow\frac{x-32}{9}=\frac{x-273}{5}&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow5x-160=9x-2457\Rightarrow4x=2297&nbsp;\\
\therefore x=574.25&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <p>একটি রেফ্রিজারেটরের কার্যকৃত সহগ, K = 2.5। এটি ঠান্ডা প্রকোষ্ঠ হতে প্রতি চক্রে 500 J&nbsp;তাপ অপসারণ করলে, প্রতি চক্রে সরবরাহকৃত কাজ কত হবে?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>500</mn><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="width: 15.002em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">200</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>500</mn><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm K=\frac{Q_1}{W}\Rightarrow W=\frac{Q_1}{K}=\frac{500}{2.5}=200\ J&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৪০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="width: 23.158em; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm \frac{1}{C_s}=\frac{1}{C_1}+\frac{1}{C_2} \Rightarrow\frac{1}{C_s}=\frac{1}{1}+\frac{1}{1}=2\Rightarrow C_s=\frac{1}{2}=0.5\ F\  </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="width: 7.607em;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 67</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তারের রোধ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="width: 1.678em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.34em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1301"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm r\ \Omega</script></span>, তারটিকে টেনে দৈর্ঘ্য দ্বিগুণ করা হলে রোধ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="width: 2.552em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.097em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.05em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1313"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm 2\ r\ \Omega </script></span></p>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
