                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.49em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1334"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1335"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-২৫৭]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 69</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি 40 W ও একটি 60 W বাতিকে শ্রেণি সমবায়ে সাজানো হলে, কোন বাতিটি বেশি উজ্জ্বল আলো দিবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সাপ্লাইয়ের ভোল্টেজের উপর নির্ভর করবে&nbsp;</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: শ্রেণি সমবায়ে বেশি ওয়াট কম আলো।<br>
সমান্তরাল সমবায়ে বেশি ওয়াট বেশি আলো।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>13</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="width: 2.507em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.01em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1360"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1362"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1363"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>13</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm 13°S</script></span></p>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১৬]</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮২৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 99</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    </div>
                                </div>

padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1623" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮২৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 108</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.592em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.798em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm \overrightarrow {AB}=\vec{B}-\vec{A} =\left(3\hat{i}-4\hat{j}+5\hat{k}\right)-\left(-3\hat{i}-2\hat{j}+1\hat{k}\right) 
\\=6\hat{i}-2\hat{j}+4\hat{k} 
</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-401"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-402"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-403"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0.</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0.</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm \vec{A}.\vec{B}=\left(4\hat{i}+3\hat{j}+0.\hat{k}\right).\left(0.\hat{i}+0.\hat{j}+7\hat{k}\right)=0 </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 111</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বস্তুুকে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4.9</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="width: 4.547em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.728em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.73em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-410"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4.9</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-414"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-416"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-417"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4.9</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm 4.9\ ms^{-1}</script></span> বেগে খাড়া উপরের দিকে ছোড়া হলো। বস্তুটি কতক্ষণ শূন্যে থাকবে?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4.9</mn></mrow><mn>9.8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="width: 10.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1008.49em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-421"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-425"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-427"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.15em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-433"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4.9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4.9</mn></mrow><mn>9.8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm T=\frac{2v_0}{g}=\frac{2\times4.9}{9.8}=1\ sec </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯০]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 112</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একই নিক্ষেপণ বেগ ও একই পাল্লার জন্য একটি নিক্ষেপণ কোণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="width: 1.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.492em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.34em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-445"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-448"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>30</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm 30° </script></span> হলে অপর কোণ কত?</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 114</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>খাড়াভাবে ওপরে নিক্ষিপ্ত বস্তুর ক্ষেত্রে বিচরণকাল, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="width: 2.759em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.237em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.16em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-451"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm T=?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="width: 4.465em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.645em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.095em, 1003.64em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-456"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 116</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1 টি কণা 1.5 m ব্যাসার্ধের বৃত্তাকার পথে প্রতিমিনিটে 120 বার আবর্তন করে। এর কৌণিক বেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12.56</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="width: 6.514em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-502"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12.56</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3.14</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>120</mn></mrow><mn>60</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>12.56</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="width: 15.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.95em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-554"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-558"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.895em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.73em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.883em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-565"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-567" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.14</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">120</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.895em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12.56</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-578"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-581"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3.14</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>120</mn></mrow><mn>60</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>12.56</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm \omega=\frac{2\pi N}{t}=\frac{2\times3.14\times120}{60}=12.56\ rads^{-1} </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২০৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 117</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন কণার বিনিময়ের কারণে&nbsp;তড়িৎ চৌম্বক বল ক্রিয়াশীল হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্রাভিটন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 119</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ডাইন ও নিউটনের সম্পর্কে সঠিক কোনটি?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3840</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="width: 14.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-735"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-745"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">60</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3840</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>60</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3840</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm W=Pt=16\times\left(4\times60\right)=3840\ J </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৭৩]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 130</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বিন্দু ভরের দরুন মহাকর্ষীয় বিভব এর সমীকরণ কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="width: 4.51em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="width: 5.467em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-792"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-796"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1001.19em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.32em, 1.186em, -999.998em); </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="width: 4.192em;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 133</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রেনল্ডের সংখ্যা, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="width: 2.349em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.902em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1001.79em, 2.61em, -999.998em);                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.993</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1011.85em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-878"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-882" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-883"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1000.82em, 4.633em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-884"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-885"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.9em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.834em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.207em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -3.973em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-891" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="font-size: 50%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.993</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.993</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\rm T=2\pi\sqrt{\frac{L}{g}} \Rightarrow L=\frac{g}{\pi^2}=0.993\ m</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬১৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm \frac{L_1}{L_2}=\frac{\left(T_1\right)^2}{\left(T_2\right)^2}=\frac{3^2}{4^2}=\frac{9}{16} </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৮১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 138</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>আমাদের বাড়িঘরে ব্যবহৃত দিক পরিবর্তী প্রবাহ কত সময় পরপর একই মান গ্রহণ করে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>

                                        </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="width: 3.782em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৭২]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 142</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>3 m তরঙ্গ দৈর্ঘ্যের একটি তরঙ্গের বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>300</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="width: 4.845em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.951em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.95em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1007"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1011"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1013"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1014"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>300</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="width: 14.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.76em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1018"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1032" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>λ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi>λ</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>300</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm v=n\lambda \Rightarrow n=\frac{v}{\lambda}=\frac{300}{3}=100\ Hz </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 143</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>শব্দের কোন তিনটি কম্পাঙ্কের সমন্বয়ে ত্রয়ী সৃষ্টি হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>256</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>320</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>384</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="width: 12.525em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>128</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>192</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>216</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="width: 11.888em;                                         <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৮৬]</p>
