                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 144</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো স্থানের শব্দের তীব্রতা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="width: 8.348em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.82em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.82em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1105"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1109"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1110"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1112"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1113"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="width: 16.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1013.53em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1125"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">log</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1130"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1131" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1132"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1133"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1134" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.7em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">log</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1141"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1142" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1143"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1144"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1146"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1163" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">80</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৭৭]</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="width: 3.554em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.917em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.69em, 2.507em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.6em, 1000.5em, 3.918em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.053em, 1000.87em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.051em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৩৭]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>160</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="width: 17.707em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1231"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.76em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">160</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm \frac{C}{5}=\frac{F-32}{9}\Rightarrow\frac{x}{5}=\frac{x-32}{9}\Rightarrow9x=5x-160 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>160</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>160</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>40</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="width: 19.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1016.07em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1245"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">160</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">160</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>40</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm \Rightarrow9x-5x=-160\Rightarrow4x=-160\Rightarrow x=-40 </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-০৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 154</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তাপীয় ইঞ্জিনের তাপ উৎস ও তাপ গ্রাহকে তাপমাত্রা যথাক্রমে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>627</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.349em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1002.35em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1267"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">627</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1269"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1270"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1271"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>61.2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="width: 3.19em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.598em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.55em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1287"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">61.2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.108em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>61.2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm 61.2\% </script></span></p>
</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>66.6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="width: 3.19em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.598em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.55em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1291"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">66.6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.108em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>66.6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm 66.6\% </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1009.22em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -2.088em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">33.3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.469em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>η</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>600</mn><mn>900</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>33.3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm \eta=\left(1-\frac{T_2}{T_1}\right)\times100\%=\left(1-\frac{600}{900}\right)\times100\%\\=\frac{1}{3}\times100\%=33.3\% </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৬]</p>

                                            <p>কার্নো চক্রের কোন ধাপে রুদ্ধতাপীয় সংকোচন দেখা যায়?</p>

                                        <br>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 157</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তাপীয় সিস্টেম কত প্রকার?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2</p>
</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>5</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: তাপীয় সিস্টেম ৩ প্রকার। যথা i. উন্মুক্ত, ii. বদ্ধ, iii. বিচ্ছিন্ন।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 161</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন চার্জ পাওয়া সম্ভব নয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="width: 1.186em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1000.91em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1378"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm 2e</script></span></p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.69em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1389"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\rm -5e</script></span></p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রকৃতিতে e মানের ভগ্নাংশে কোনো চার্জের অস্তিত্ব নেই।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 162</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="width: 13.035em; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-size: 70.7%; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="width: 3.895em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm \therefore C_s=1</script></span>=<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৭]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 167</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি পরিবাহী তারের রোধের মান <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3A9;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="width: 1.529em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.231em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.19em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1541"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1543"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1544"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>Ω</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm 6Ω</script></span>। এর দৈর্ঘ্য টেনে তিনগুণ করলে রোধ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>18</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3A9;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.69em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1553"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">18</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1555"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1556"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>18</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>Ω</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm 18 Ω </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>36</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3A9;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.69em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1559"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">36</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1561"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1562"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>36</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>Ω</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">\rm 36 Ω </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>54</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3A9;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1564" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.69em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1565"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">54</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1567"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1568"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>54</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>Ω</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\rm 54 Ω </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mfrac><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1570" style="width: 3.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.62em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1571"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1574" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1575" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mfrac><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\rm R\propto\frac{L}{A};</script></span> পরিবাহী তারকে টেনে এর দৈর্ঘ্য 3 গুণ করলে ক্ষেত্রফল এক-তৃতীয়াংশ হয়ে যায়।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>54</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="width: 23.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1018.94em, 3.117em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1579"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1581" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1583" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">ρ</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1586"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1587"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.11em, 4.428em, -999.998em); top: -3.482em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1590"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1591"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1592" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1593" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1594" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.27em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1596" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1598" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1600" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">ρ</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1601"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.22em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1602"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1605" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1606" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1607" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1608" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.38em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.379em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">54</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>ρ</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>54</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm \therefore R^\prime=\rho\frac{3L}{\frac{1}{3}A}\Rightarrow R^\prime=\rho\frac{L\times3\times3}{A}=R\times9=6\times9=54\ \Omega </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 168</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>টর্চের প্রতি কোষের বিভব কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 169</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সাধারনত বদ্ধ বর্তনীতে কোষের দুই প্রান্তের বিভব পার্থক্য-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িচ্চালক শক্তির চেয়ে কম হয়</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িচ্চালক শক্তির চেয়ে বেশি হয়&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িচ্চালক শক্তির সমান হয়&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নষ্ট ভোল্টের সমান হয়&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বদ্ধ বর্তনীতে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1641" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.76em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1642"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1643" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1644" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1645" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\rm I\neq0</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="width: 9.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1007.95em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1647"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1648" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">I</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">I</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">\rm \therefore E=\ V+Ir\therefore Ir>1 </script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.3em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1662"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\rm E>V</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-২০৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>প্যারাচৌম্বক পদার্থ নিচের কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: তামা, বিসমাথ → ডায়াচৌম্বক; লোহা → ফেরোচৌম্বক।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৩৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: তরঙ্গদৈর্ঘ্যের ক্রম: বেগুনি &lt; নীল &lt; আসমানী &lt; সবুজ &lt; হলুদ &lt; কমলা &lt; লাল।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৪১]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 179</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub><msub><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1666" style="width: 2.908em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.386em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.604em, 1002.39em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1667"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1668"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.082em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 182</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মাংসপেশির টান বা ব্যথার চিকিৎসায় কোন তরঙ্গ ব্যবহৃত হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১৬]</p>

                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 192</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অ্যালুমিনিয়ামকে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-142-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="width: 1.753em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.529em, 1001.34em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1767"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-142">\rm \alpha-</script></span>কণা দ্বারা আঘাত করলে কী উৎপন্ন হয়?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২৩, পৃষ্ঠা-৮০৪]</p>
